overview:
Ian Winn is a Chartered Accountant who has over 14 year’s experience at an executive level in a number of service orientated businesses operating in the finance and technology sector.

Ian qualified as an accountant with KPMG prior to his move into industry. From 1996 to 2000 Ian held a number of senior roles with Euro Sales Finance plc culminating in operations director and company secretary, during a time of significant growth for that business. Ian has been Finance Director of Accumuli since 2007 during which he has overseen the business through a period of considerable change, disposing of significant parts of the group for in excess of Â£5 million.
